Abyssal Saintess Elcadia: If we believe the Life of Solin, which we read in the library, the Embryo is directly related to Solin. However, nothing else we never found out. To find out what the Embryo, we need to go to the Monastery of Silence. [Quest Q10293_SevenSignsForbiddenBookOfTheElmoredenKingdom elcardia_q10293_7.htm|"Monastery of Silence?"]
